alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Doniphan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 6:43PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Doniphan, northern Atchison, Holt, southwestern Nodaway and central Andrew Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 642 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Falls City, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Savannah, Mound City, Highland, Troy, Oregon, Maitland, Amazonia, Forest City, Craig, Fillmore, White Cloud, Denton, Graham, Big Lake, Rosendale, Severance, Huron, Leona, Fortescue and Bigelow. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 54 and 97. Interstate 229 between mile markers 11 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
